#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(Test_Hardware)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../src/VisionSoilAnalyzer/Hardware/Debug/libHardware.a)
add_executable(Test_Hardware Test_Hardware.cpp)
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -pthread")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -pthread")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH} )
target_link_libraries(Test_Hardware -L/usr/local/lib -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_core -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_flann -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgcodecs -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_ml -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_shape -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_superres -lopencv_ts -lopencv_video -lopencv_videoio -lopencv_videostab "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
include_directories(/usr/local/include /usr/local/include/opencv)
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -pthread")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -pthread")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH} /usr/local/lib)
